cbinstall.name: CB JComments
cbinstall.author: smart
cbinstall.description: Displays last user comments and allows to comment user's profile

param.name: source
param.label: Source
param.description: Component or components names (separated by comma like com_content,com_k2,com_sobi2) to display comments from.

param.name: count
param.label: Comments Limit
param.description: Enter the maximum number of comments you would like listed in the tab

param.name: limit_comment_texth
param.label: Comment Text Limit
param.description: Please enter in a numeric character limit value. The comment text will be trimmed to the number of characters you enter

param.name: show_smiles
param.label: Smiles
param.description: Select whether to show smiles as text or as images

param.name: show_readmore
param.label: Link 'Read more...'
param.description: If set to Show, the 'Read more...' link will be shown after comment's text.
